marklogic.body:
When does the spending in Washington end. Our wonderful senators now want to hold hearing in relation to the NFL that the NFL Commissioner just settled. Why does the senate think that they have to get involved in every issue, and waste tax payer money that they don't really have to spend! Instead of trying to get involved in something new. Why don't they try to fix things that have been on the table for years.
They all need to go! They are just Bleeding us dry, and they will Always continue to.
